articles.title: Colts to start Philip Rivers vs. Seahawks just days after QB came out of retirement - NFL.com
articles.description: More than four years after playing his last snap, Philip Rivers will be elevated from the Indianapolis Colts practice squad to the team's active roster in hopes of remedying the team’s QB ills.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Police detain organizer of Messi's India tour after chaos breaks out at brief appearance - NBC News
articles.description: Lionel Messi's tour of India kicked off chaotically on Saturday as fans threw objects, ripped up seats and invaded the pitch at Kolkata's Salt Lake stadium after the Argentine soccer great made only a brief appearance at a ticketed event
